body:
Hi Iván,


Do it in MingW like so:


	vwrays -d -x xres -y yres [view options] > dimensions.txt
	vwrays -x xres -y yres [view options] -fd \
		| rtrace -fd -h -opN scene.oct \
		| rtrace -fdc -I @dimensions.txt scene.oct \
		> irradiance.pic
	rm dimensions.txt


-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2008-June/005088.html).</sup>
